name: The Rise of the Mole Crusher
name_original: The Rise of the Mole Crusher
description:
What is this?

This game has been created for Cheap Jam. Although the jam doesn't have a theme, I have tried to make everything look as cheap as possible (missed aligns, bad particles, bad music, power play).

This is a classic "hit the mole" game with enemy variant. It speeds up as time goes on.

How to play?

Just click to hole in which the mole appears. But don't hit the red one.

You have three lives.
